This is a method used to Update proposal in a string which is sent in a Response Entity.
updateProposal(String) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.services.ProposalService
Updates and returns an existing Proposal object according to the specified Request Body String containing the following: id value of the Proposal which is being updated, New/Updated Title of the Proposal New/Updated Textual description of the Proposal.

Upvotes - Class in com.soprabanking.ips.models
Class representing an upvote made by a User on a given Proposal.Specifies all the fields and relationships of Upvote entity in the database.
Upvotes() - Constructor for class com.soprabanking.ips.models.Upvotes
Initializes a newly created Upvotes object so that it represents an empty upvote.
